Enumeration Type Documentation

enum CallerType

Class for implementing any per bank related policy.

Description: This class handles all the operations related to a bank in the MC. Currently it contains 3 per bank scheduling algorithms (FR-FCFS, FCFS & PAR-BS). It also maintains all bank related state information required in the memory controller.
